nodes.text: Cracken's Rebel Field Guide: Slicing Aids

Cracken's Rebel Field Guide: Slicing Aids was an article presented in the Star Wars Adventure Journal 10. Following roughly the same format as the book of the same name, it profiled Rebels under the command of Alliance Intelligence chief Airen Cracken. It also included roleplaying stats for inclusion in games of Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
